Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client.GraphicElements.Board

Class BoardScene

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.GraphicElements.Board.BoardScene
public class BoardScene
extends java.lang.Object
this class create a scene with the board and the button God List where every player can read the name and the power of the god in the game. another button "endPhase" is present in the scene and is made visible only when necessary.
